p: After CMC‐G film preparation, DbE was added with concentrations of 0, 300, 450, and 600 ppm and stirred for 4 min. Then, the mixture was divided into two sections. One section was used to the immersion of pistachios, and the other one was placed on a plate and was heated up to 35°C for 24 hr to be completely dry. Dried films were peeled off the glass petri dishes slowly and maintained in an aluminum foil until usage.
